name: ace-lib-theme
description: ace-lib-theme is a Sass-powered style sheet theme builder utility for ace-lib components. It can be directly dropped into your Sass powered cui templates.

scripts.css: npm run css-compile && npm run css-minify
scripts.css-compile: node-sass  --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 assets/scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-examples: npm run css-examples-compile && npm run css-examples-minify
scripts.css-examples-minify: cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output ./examples/css/blue-green/ace-theme.min.css ./examples/css/blue-green/ace-theme.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output ./examples/css/pink/ace-theme.min.css ./examples/css/pink/ace-theme.css && cleancss --level 1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output ./examples/css/teal/ace-theme.min.css ./examples/css/teal/ace-theme.css

author: agileapps.dev.com@gmail.com
